subject: Concessions in user fee to local residents : Public funded projects
text: #TTrrv 774lq TTTHTf 4ifaazvT Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (T 9ar7, 73r 4a671 3< TTMHT TATTT4) 91-11-25093507/25093514 Extn, 2223/2318/246 8/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka , Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/19/02-03/CMD-CO/Conceession Vol III 29/h  March 2005 CIRCULARNQ_NHAVCOMMERCIAL QPERATIONS/56 SUB: CONCESSIONS IN USER FEE TO LOCAL RESIDENTS: PUBLIC FUNDED PROJECTS In partial modification of earlier circular no_ NHAICM/RM-1/462 dated 5.8.2002 (copy enclosed) and with a view to providing consolidated instructions the matter of concession in user fee to local residents, following instructions are issued for implementation with immediate effect in respect of sections/bridges under Public Funded Projects. Car/Jeep/Van 1 = Local Area Monthly Passes at the monthly rate of Rs. 150 /- (Rupees One Hundred and only) for the residents of villages/towns/cities falling within a radius of 10 km from the fee collection booths may be issued for their carljeeplvan 0n production of residence proof and the ownership of the vehicle for which the pass is issued. 2_ Local Area Monthly Passes at the monthly rate of Rs 300 /- (Rupees Three Hundred only) for the residents of villages/towns/cities falling within a radius of more than 10 km and upto 20 km from the fee collection booths may be issued for their car/jeeplvan on production of residence and the ownership of the vehicle for which the pass is issued. Further details about eligible users in above categories are given at Annex A Buses 3 Monthly passes for the State Transport buses may be given at the specified rate in favour of State Government Transport on the certification by the Competent Authority (not less than General Manager, State Government Road Transport) certifying the number of buses plying in the rout per In case of Private local operators we may consider the same on production of their permit for the route operators and time-table of the route operation duly certified by the District Transport Authority. wlo Fax MuuM NHAL New on Fifty proof= being proof being proof day.
